description: Initialize React TypeScript project with Vite
acceptance_criteria: package.json with react, react-dom, typescript, vite
npm run dev starts on port 3000
Basic styling with CSS modules or inline styles

description: Create API client for backend communication
acceptance_criteria: src/api/todoApi.ts exports functions for all CRUD operations
Uses fetch with proper error handling
Base URL configurable via environment variable
Exports: getTodos(), getTodo(id), createTodo(data), updateTodo(id, data), deleteTodo(id)
notes: Wait for backend API to be ready before implementing

acceptance_criteria: src/types/todo.ts imports or re-exports types from shared/types.ts
Or copies types if import not possible
Todo, CreateTodoDto, UpdateTodoDto available for use
notes: CRITICAL: Must use exact types from backend shared/types.ts

acceptance_criteria: Shows error state if fetch fails
Each todo displays title and completed status
Completed todos have visual distinction (strikethrough or checkmark)

description: Create TodoForm component for adding todos
acceptance_criteria: src/components/TodoForm.tsx with input and submit button

description: Add toggle complete and delete functionality
acceptance_criteria: Clicking toggle calls updateTodo() with toggled completed state
Clicking delete calls deleteTodo() and removes from list
Optimistic UI updates with rollback on error
